Text: Non US LocationsHere you go Call with questions

Out of Office AutoReply Integration MeetingI will be out of the office on Holiday from Friday December through January I will be back on Wednesday January If you need immediate assistance please contact Leticia Barrios x or Joe Dorn x Merry Christmas and Happy New Year

RE Change of Control ProvisionsWOW I always new you cared about us but reading this made me cry We have been lucky to have you I hope your family enjoys you as much as your extended family here at Enron does Ive only contributed to Enron for two years but Ive always been very proud of Enron and will continue to be proud regardless of what happens long term Take care and remember most of us are saying a lot of prayers Original Message From Ken Lay Office of the Chairman Sent Tue PM To DLGAallenronworldwide Cc Subject Change of Control Provisions As many of you know I have a provision in my employment contract which provides for a payment of million per year for the remaining term of my contract in the event of a change of control of Enron The merger with Dynegy or a similar transaction with any other company would trigger this provision on closing Assuming the merger with Dynegy is closed within months as we expect this provision would entitle me to total payments of slightly more than million Many CEOs have change of control provisions in their employment contracts and mine has been in place since But given the current circumstances facing the company and our employees I have been giving a lot of thought these last few days to what to do about this payment Initially I thought I would use part of the funds for a foundation for our employees and take the remainder in stock and cash However after talking to a number of employees this afternoon I have decided that the best course of action would be for me to waive my right to any of this payment Therefore at closing I will receive no payments under this provision I know this action does not remedy the uncertainty that you and your families face But please know that I will continue to do everything in my power to serve the best interests of Enrons employees and shareholders I am still very proud of what we have built at Enron and I want to continue working with all of you to correct the problems and restore Enron to its rightful place in the energy industry Thank you

RE REVISION RAC LISTING Please Read Immediately Cc Done Original Message From Walton Sheila Sent Monday November PM To Schultea Kathryn Cc Buy Rick Subject REVISION RAC LISTING Please Read Immediately Importance High Sensitivity Confidential Please make the following change o the RAC list BELLINGHAUSEN LYNN G Terminate for future days out SOO JEFFREY A Terminate Immediately Please confirm when this has been done and call me at Ext Thanks Sheila Walton

RE Oct Meeting Cc I do have a conflict with this meeting I will be in AC from If you need me please call me in there If not Ill be at my desk x after that in case you need to call me into your meeting Thanks Original Message From Goode Diane Sent Thursday October PM To Cash Michelle Yowman Andrea Schultea Kathryn Palmer Lizzette Donahue Jeff Cc Matson Jo ann Sweet Twanda Subject Oct Meeting Importance High This email confirms our meeting at pm Monday Oct We will meet in Conference Room EB Mr Jeanneret Please call me from the lobby and I will come down to meet you New Security Requirement My direct number is Thanks Diane

Out of Office AutoReply MidYear PRC DataI will be out of the office attending a conference this week I will be back in the office on Thursday If you need immediate assistance please contact Felicia Buenrostro at x

RE MidYear PRC Data Cc Ill be providing you these files today Original Message From Yowman Andrea Sent Monday October AM To Goode Diane Cc Cash Michelle Schultea Kathryn Subject RE MidYear PRC Data Sensitivity Confidential Hi Diane The attached files are Business Objects reports and should be converted to excel by Kathy Schultea Kathy should be adding the HR employees and then the files should go directly with Jeanneret No need to copy me on the files due to confidentiality of HR data You can just let me know the files went Thanks ay Original Message From Goode Diane Sent Monday October AM To Cc Cash Michelle Yowman Andrea Subject MidYear PRC Data Importance High Sensitivity Confidential File Diversity Mid Year Download for calculating Standard deviationrep File Diversity Mid Year Download for calculating Standard deviation expatsrep Mr Jeanneret I am forwarding these file at Michelle Cashs request After you have received and opened these files please call Michelle Cash to discuss the types of analyses we would like to have performed on the data Michelle Cashs direct number is If you have any problems with the attachments please contact me at the number below Diane Goode Senior Specialist Enron North America Smith Street EB Houston TX fax Diane nroncom Privileged and Confidential Prepared in Anticipation of Litigation

RE Michelles request for info Cc For the need info below YTD tuition reimbursement expense Estimated YTG k Original Message From Taylor Diane Sent Sunday December PM To Schultea Kathryn Cc Cashion Tana Subject Michelles request for info For the following question from Michelles list Para Please update million figure to reflect tuition reimbursement expenses Can you please run the following reports YTD payments for Wagetype Tuition Non Taxable and Tuition Taxable For an estimate for December I would suggest running the same wagetypes for the month of May I am assuming that May and December are comparable for reimbursement requests Thanks Diane

FW Message Received in EMA Cc Can you forward me a list of the bankruptcy companies Thanks Original Message From Morrison Johnna Sent Tuesday December AM To Schultea Kathryn Subject FW Message Received in EMA FYIjust to let you know that I am waiting on them to get me a list of bankruptcy companies You wouldnt happen to have that would you Johnna Original Message From Wulfson Cyndi Sent Monday December PM To Morrison Johnna Subject RE Message Received in EMA Hmmm good question I will make sure Marsha makes a distinction Thanks Original Message From Morrison Johnna Sent Monday December PM To Wulfson Cyndi Subject RE Message Received in EMA No it doesnt sound crazy it is exactly what I was hoping you would provide Please send the company numbers with the list Also just to make sure you want employees only not contractors or joint venture employees right Thanks Johnna Original Message From Wulfson Cyndi Sent Monday December PM To Morrison Johnna Cc Enron Messaging Administration Subject RE Message Received in EMA I talked to Marsha and Mr Bowen is going to give us a list of bankrupt and nonbankrupt companies Then could you send us four lists bankrupt domestic employees nonbankrupt domestic employees bankrupt international employees nonbankrupt international employees Does that sound crazy Ill forward the list when I get it Thanks Cyndi Original Message From Morrison Johnna Sent Monday December PM To Wulfson Cyndi Cc Schultea Kathryn Dorn Joe Subject RE Message Received in EMA Cindi I need some clarification on the lists that you need We currently have lists for ALL SAP US which should provide the domestic people and by combining the ALL GLOBAL list with the ALL SAP UK list you should have the international people How do we distinguish between the bankrupt and nonbankrupt entities Do you have a list of companies that define this Regards Johnna Original Message From Schultea Kathryn Sent Monday December AM To Dorn Joe Morrison Johnna Cc Wulfson Cyndi Subject FW Message Received in EMA Can you help Cyndi with what is needed here Thanks Original Message From Wulfson Cyndi Sent Monday December AM To Schultea Kathryn Subject FW Message Received in EMA Kathy We need new lists See below can you do that Original Message From NAHOULNMAI NRON Sent Monday December AM To Pardillo Joy Wulfson Cyndi Subject Message Received in EMA From Marsha nronXgate on AM To Enron Messaging nron cc Subject FW Distribution lists See Ray Bowens message below who can I talk to about this Thanks Marsha Original Message From Bowen Jr Raymond Sent Monday December AM To Schiller Marsha Subject Distribution lists Can you talk to the people that manage global messaging and make sure that they have the ability to segregate broadcast messages into domestic and international and bankrupt and nonbankrupt entities It is important that we clean this up Ray Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet

RE Year End Reorgs and Mass Transfers Cc I agree If the names are closer to being verified I can help with getting reports on visas etc Let me know Thanks Original Message From Oxley David Sent Wednesday December PM To Cash Michelle Davies Neil Cc Fitzpatrick Amy Slone Jeanie Jones Robert W HR Exec Schultea Kathryn Subject RE Year End Reorgs and Mass Transfers I agree BobbyKathy any objections May be premature until Amy and Jeanie have verified that all names on list are in agreement to transfer Original Message From Cash Michelle Sent Wednesday December PM To Davies Neil Oxley David Cc Fitzpatrick Amy Slone Jeanie Subject RE Year End Reorgs and Mass Transfers I do think transferring all Netco employees to ENA would be effective We easily could do a master assignment of all the employment agreements on a single document that does not have to be signed by the employees For those without assignment clause we could do a document in which the employee agrees and consents to the assignment to ENA and to any other company that may buy the trading business of ENA On visa issues I agree with your approach although would suggest that no deal with TF is possible given that we already owe them over K on prepetition fees I dont think the deal team or counterparty would have any say in this We will let them know that all relevant employees are in ENA and that should do it Michelle Original Message From Davies Neil Sent Wednesday December PM To Oxley David Cash Michelle Cc Fitzpatrick Amy Slone Jeanie Subject FW Year End Reorgs and Mass Transfers Importance High DavidMichelle Based on your knowledge of the deal structure Do you think that we should transfer all Netco employees to ENA wef from ENWCORP etc and at the same time do letters confirming assignment of EEAs for those on EEAs with CorpENW etc who have an assignment clause Also suggest we ask those who do not have the assignment term in their agreement to sign an amendment to their agreement assigning the contract to ENA Also as we are likely to apply for new H visas for all L visas I would think it makes sense for new visas this to be with ENA as I assume this is the most likely company to be part of the acquisition Therefore we will need to do transfer letters for those employees who are not ENA employees as part of this exercise Tyndall and Forster will probably require an upfront payment to apply for these visas for the premium processing Therefore we will need to cut a cheque to them for L transfers of circa we may be able to negotiate this down some We can then if necessary transfer over the Hs at the appropriate time to the new entity We should try to get these exercises to coincide DavidMIchelle can you discuss this approach with the deal teamcounterparty especially as seems a no brainer Neil Original Message From Figueroa Regina Sent Wednesday December PM To Becker Melissa Blaylock John Booth Khymberly Broussard Tharsilla Brown Daniel Buckley Karen Campos Karen E Clyatt Julie Curless Amanda Davies Neil De Jesus Frank Fitzpatrick Amy Foster David Funkhouser Shanna Galloway Sonja Gray Judy Hankamer Cecilia Hickok Kim Huynh Catherine Jones Robert W HR Exec Kearney Julie Kinningham Laura Labbe Anne Lopez Leasa Mayes Fran McLoughlin Hector Migliore Todd Oquinn Kari Orourke Tim Parra Veronica Petteway Alisa Pieper Kalen Pierce Shelly Roberts Paulette Rodriguez Grace Russi Estalee Ryan Noel Seleznov Ryan Slone Jeanie Tessandori Bobbi Walton Sheila Whitney Jennifer Yeverino Norma Zarkowsky Sarah Zermeno Rosalinda Barnard Marla Pena Renee Harkreader Jerry Houston Rita Hutcherson Leesa Robles Eduardo Reese Frances Cc Wheeler Terrie Alvarez Irma Odell David Subject Year End Reorgs and Mass Transfers Its time for yearend reorganizations and mass transfers at Enron again Attached are documents that explain the Mass Reorg and Transfer process for this year as well as templates to submit the data for processing Please make sure that the appropriate templates are submitted File ReorgMassTransfHRppt File OrgStructureApprovalsdoc File InterComoveTemplateProgramxls File IntraComoveTemplateProgramxls We will be discussing these items in tomorrows HR Generalist meeting Let me know if you have any questions and please forward this email to anyone I may have missed Regina Figueroa Corp HR

RE Employee ListMichelleJo Ann these people do not show up in the HR Data Warehouse HRGIS or EPC structures from what we can tell based off the names provided If they have identification numbers that we can use it may help since names can be misspelled easily We searched by last name then checked each one for a match on first or middle name Let me know if you have any other information Kathy Original Message From Hill Jo Ann Sent Tuesday November AM To Schultea Kathryn Cc Cash Michelle Subject FW Employee List Kathy please see attached file For those individuals listed as having no record in SAP can you please check to see if these people are in either EPC or HRGIS and provide the requested information Please return the file to Michelle Cash Thanks Jo Ann Original Message From Cash Michelle Sent Monday November PM To Hill Jo Ann Subject RE Employee List Jo Ann Could you please coordinate with Kathy to get the answers Thanks Michelle Original Message From Hill Jo Ann Sent Mon PM To Cash Michelle Cc Subject RE Employee List Michelle thats why I worded it the way I did I only have enterprise access to SAP Kathy Schultea would be the person who could query the global system andor the old EPC system if they were terminated in EPC Any other questions please let me know Thanks Jo Ann Original Message From Cash Michelle Sent Monday November AM To Hill Jo Ann Subject FW Employee List Jo Ann what is the answer Michelle Original Message From ENRON Sent Monday November AM To Cash Michelle Cc Murray Julia Sweet Twanda Subject Re Employee List Thanks for the information however I have a question for the individuals in which we have No record in SAP Do we know for certain that these individuals where not employed with Enron or is it that there is no record of them in SAP HR Would a query out of the HR datawarehouse tell us more information Thanks Kevin To Kevin R NDERSEN WO cc Michelle nron Date AM com Subject Employee List Sent by om Message Mailed On Behalf Of affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you See attached file M CashIndividualsxls Internet Email Confidentiality Footer PrivilegedConfidential Information may be contained in this message If you are not the addressee indicated in this message or responsible for delivery of the message to such person you may not copy or deliver this message to anyone In such case you should destroy this message and kindly notify the sender by reply email Please advise immediately if you or your employer do not consent to Internet email for messages of this kind Opinions conclusions and other information in this message that do not relate to the official business of my firm shall be understood as neither given nor endorsed by it M CashIndividualsxls File M CashIndividualsxls

Re The Power of Who expertfinderyou for your note There was a little timing issue of when the email went out compared to when the switch was turned on We are in the process of moving code now and it should be up within the half hour Im hoping youll enjoy the application Let us know your thoughts Thanks From Jeff Dasovich on PM Sent by Jeff Dasovich To Enron nron cc Subject Re The Power of Who expertfinder Greetings I tried to log in and the system told me that Im not authorized to use the system Best Jeff

Re The Power of Who expertfinderyou for your note There was a little timing issue of when the email went out compared to when the switch was turned on We are in the process of moving code now and it should be up within the half hour Im hoping youll enjoy the application Let us know your thoughts Thanks From Jeff Dasovich on PM Sent by Jeff Dasovich To Enron nron cc Subject Re The Power of Who expertfinder Greetings I tried to log in and the system told me that Im not authorized to use the system Best Jeff
